quoteText: We reserve the right to change the Terms at any time, but if we do, we will bring it to your attention by placing a notice on the website (https://www.bluestacks.com/terms.html), by sending you an email, and/or by some other means.
title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
